Manager
Batch
Basic implementation of RecordHandlerManager, that allows only for a single flow. The manager decides which handlers to be used for a specific record.
See also
Github - Manager Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.batch.RecordHandlerManager
Syntax
Copy
<Manager />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
Name of the manager
initial	boolean	false
This manager is the initial manager, i.e. to be used for the first record
active	text	-
If defined and empty or false, then this element and all its children are ignored
Nested Components
COMPONENT NAME	DESCRIPTION	CARDINALITY
flow	Element that contains the handlers for a specific record type, to be assigned to the manager	0 .. n
